query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS studentTopicPerformance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  childId INT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  topic VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  
  totalAttempts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  totalQuestions INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  correctAnswers INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  accuracyPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
  avgTimePerQuestion INT,
  
  easyCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  easyTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  mediumCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  mediumTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  hardCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  hardTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  
  performanceLevel ENUM('weak', 'neutral', 'strong') NOT NULL,
  confidenceScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  
  lastUpdated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  
  UNIQUE KEY unique_child_topic (childId, subject, topic)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3jAcJMG4wP9JZTZ.root --database JbjjhFNe4aEjNxVY9pJJsJ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS studentTopicPerformance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  childId INT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  topic VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  
  totalAttempts INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  totalQuestions INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  correctAnswers INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  accuracyPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
  avgTimePerQuestion INT,
  
  easyCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  easyTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  mediumCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  mediumTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  hardCorrect INT DEFAULT 0,
  hardTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  
  performanceLevel ENUM('weak', 'neutral', 'strong') NOT NULL,
  confidenceScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  
  lastUpdated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  
  UNIQUE KEY unique_child_topic (childId, subject, topic)
);
